Thanks for your help.  That seemed to fix the problem (or at least one of
the problems).

Now, when I run 'make win', I get the error (I've attached the output)
messages that say:

Warning: .drectve `-defaultlib:msvcprt ' unrecognized
...
Cannot export _addCanteraDirectory: symbol not found
...
C:/cygwin/home/Administrator/cantera-cvs/build/lib/i686-pc-win32/clib.lib(./
Release/ctonedim.obj)(.text+0xc):C:\cygwin\home\Adm: undefined reference to
`__except_list'
...

It seems to be mixing gcc and c++ compilers, is this a problem?

gcc -fno-strict-aliasing -DNDEBUG -g -O3 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -I../../b
uild/include -Isrc -I../clib/src -I/usr/include/python2.3 -c
src/pycantera.cpp -o build/temp.cygwin-1.5.11-i686-2.3/src/pyca
ntera.o
c++ -shared -Wl,--enable-auto-image-base
build/temp.cygwin-1.5.11-i686-2.3/src/pycantera.o
build/temp.cygwin-1.5.11-i686-2.3/src/writelog.o -LC:/cygwin/home/Administra
tor/cantera-cvs/build/lib/i686-pc
-win32 -LC:/cygwin/home/Administrator/cantera-cvs/build/lib/i686-pc-win32 -L
/usr/lib/python2.3/config -lclib -lzeroD -loneD -ltransport -lcantera -lreci
pes -lctlapack -lctblas -lctmath -lcvode -ltpx -
lstdc++ -lg2c -lm -lpython2.3 -o
build/lib.cygwin-1.5.11-i686-2.3/Cantera/_cantera.dll
collect2: ld terminated with signal 11 [Segmentation fault], core dumped

Any help you could give would be greatly appreciated.




-----Original Message-----
From: Moffat, Harry K [mailto:hkmoffa@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 2004 3:37 PM
To: 'cantera@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [cantera] clib.dll file


Hi,
   Requiring clib.dll for MSVC++v6.0 compiles was an error that
slipped in while trying to port Cantera to MSVC++ v7.0. The
error should now be fixed in the CVS directory structure. I'm
not sure if the error is in any of the distributions.

If you do the cvs checkout, autconf, and configure steps again it should
be fixed, though I don't have the MSVC++v6.0 compiler to verify this.

Best wishes,
Harry


-----Original Message-----
From: kvirgilm [mailto:kvm@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 2004 2:20 PM
To: cantera@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [cantera] clib.dll file



Does anyone know when the clib.dll file is created.  I compiled 'all'
in VisualStudio and now I'm trying to run 'make win' and clib.dll is
nowhere to be found.

make[1]: *** No rule to make target `../../build/lib/i686-pc-
win32/clib.dll', needed by `_winbuild'.
  Stop.
